title: Welcome to your first mission!
description: Creating your own unique presence through your person is the first step to building your network.

title: Introduction to Cold Introductions
description: A cold introduction is the initial contact you make with someone you don't know personally. It's often used in professional settings to connect for career opportunities, business development, or personal growth. The goal is to introduce yourself, show genuine interest, and establish a foundation for further communication.

title: Introduction to Warm Introductions
description: A warm introduction is when a mutual contact facilitates the initial connection between you and someone you want to meet. This type of introduction leverages the existing relationship of the mutual contact to establish trust and credibility right from the start.
